cont.entity_a: Much higher quality results than the Kodak P850 it replaced. Best DSLR for the money with superior image quality compared to point-and-shoot cameras. Takes great pictures even in low light without the flash. Takes good pictures with accurate colors and sensitivity up to ISO 3200. Fast shutter speed and excellent picture quality. Outdoor results are outstanding, and indoor results are very good.

Built-in anti-shake is a must-have feature, making it superior to expensive anti-shake lenses. Compatible with old K lenses if they have electronic dots on the inside ring. Compatible with any K mount lens and works fully auto with AF lenses. Shake reduction is effective. Compatible with old lenses, enhancing value for existing Pentax users. Image stabilization is effective.
cont.entity_b: Focal plane dust removal system is unmatched by Canon and Nikon. Kodak KAF8300CE imager chip provides high performance.

cont.entity_a: Battery life with Sanyo eneloop rechargeables is excellent due to low self-discharge rate. Requires high-capacity rechargeable AA batteries for optimal performance. Battery life can be a limitation.
Offers comparable features to Nikon and Canon at a fraction of the cost. Best DSLR for the money.
cont.entity_b: Great price for an outdated camera with a full array of accessories. Best priced 8mp digital SLR available.

cont.entity_a: Transition from point-and-shoot to DSLR is clean and effortless with the K100D. Extremely user-friendly.
cont.entity_b: E-300 is intuitive and easy to use. Easy to learn and operate. Menus are easy to navigate with well-laid-out buttons.

cont.entity_a: Durable and has survived drops without damage.
cont.entity_b: Built tough and feels great to hold. Solid camera with a nice feel.

cont.entity_a: The 18-55mm kit lens offers high quality for a low price. 18-55mm lens lacks telephoto capability, which may require additional lens purchases.
Great for new users and provides excellent value for those entering the DSLR world.
cont.entity_b: Great for someone getting used to a DSLR.

cont.entity_a: Auto-focus is generally good, but can have difficulty focusing skyward.
cont.entity_b: Focusing can be tricky, especially in imperfect lighting.

cont.entity_a: Basic SLR digital camera of very good quality.
cont.entity_b: Physically feels better than Rebel or comparative Nikon.
Automatic settings can result in poorly lit and blurry pictures.
